post.text: This is Crooked Hillary at her finest! Our future Vice President Mike Pence speaks the TRUTH about the shady Clinton Foundation!

comment.author: Julia
comment.text: That's right Pence!!! Kaine couldn't handle the truth that's why he FINALLY kept quiet but he was very fidgety. Then the biased moderator shut pence up AGAIN!!!

replies.author: Christopher
replies.text: His defense was "Donald Trump is not a polished politician"
